The #Lakers and #Knicks are expected to pursue sharpshooter Doug McDermott in #NBA free agency. #Pacers would also like to re-sign him, source tells @HoopAnalysisNet.
[Massey] Per a league source to @HoopAnalysisNet, the Philadelphia #76ers are expected to pursue Doug McDermott in free agency.
Philadelphia 76ers expected to pursue sharpshooter Doug McDermott in free agency

[Hollinger] Sources say T.J. McConnell is likely staying in Indiana for, at or slightly above, the non-taxpayer MLE. But a more interesting question is if the Pacers can keep Doug McDermott too. Sources say they are trying, but he may have offers for the MLE or above.
Doug McDermott played 162 games in the 2017-2018 NBA regular season
[McDonald] Rudy Gay is gone. Patty Mills is gone. If DeMar DeRozan is to also leave, the oldest player on the Spurs' roster as it stands would be 29-year-old Doug McDermott.
[Charania] Free agent Doug McDermott has agreed to a three-year, $42 million deal with the San Antonio Spurs, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium.
[Wolfson] The Minnesota Timberwolves are open to moving Jarrett Culver for a second-round pick. They are also interested in free agent Doug McDermott.
[Charania] Free agent Doug McDermott has agreed to a three-year, $42 million deal with the San Antonio Spurs, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium.

[Pacers] TRADE: We have received a future second round pick from the San Antonio Spurs in exchange for the contract of Doug McDermott, a future second round pick and the right to swap second round picks in a future draft.
